description: dark night scene with figure walking at left carrying lantern and umbrella; standing puddles on path at center; buildings at left and right; tree at right
inscription:
Signature, Edition, Inscription and Stamp

LLC, in pencil: [2]; on back, in pencil: [APG 12987]
markings: bottom center, stamped in red: [F (owl) B]; on back, stamped in black: [H. M. P.]
medium: Etching, drypoint, aquatint, roulette and stop-out
provenance: [Henri M. Petiet, (his stamp not in Lugt), Paris]; [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until 2000; sold in September for IROO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2000-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRQ, in pencil: [Félix Buhot]; LRC below image, in pencil: [2eme]
title: The Night Patrol
